name: Dukkah Mashed Potatoes
description: Creamy mashed potatoes with a novel nutty crunch. The texture and flavour of Dukkah lends an exotic yum factor that everyone will love!
preparation: In a Multipurpose Pot, boil potatoes until tender. Drain and return to pot. Cover, and set aside.
In a saucepan or in a Prep Bowl, mix milk with Herb & Garlic Dip Mix. Heat or microwave on medium for 2 minutes.
In a large bowl, mash or whip potatoes until lump-free. Add milk mixture and olive oil, and stir until smooth. Sprinkle with prepared Dukkah, and serve.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, onion & garlic.
